answers.answer: They did that to me. Moved it from june 14 to june 7th because I have gestational diabetes. Is there a reason why they changed yours?
Were you measuring big? That could cause them to change it.
My ob said that my son is measureing big so she moved it up
Same thing happened to me they had due on May 11 and they changed it to April 30. For the same reason was measuring big.

question: So i went to my ob and they changed my due date from the 18th to the 13th( june) didn't know they would do that so late in the game i'm super confused
title: changeing due date?
